requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 / Ryzen 3 3200G @ 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon Pro WX 5100
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
